[CHERNIHIV REGION, UKRAINE - APRIL 1, 2022: A view of military hardware of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, seized by Russian troops near the city of Chernihiv. Tensions started heating up in Donbass in February 2022. The Russian Armed Forces conduct a special military operation in Ukraine in response to requests from the leaders of the Donetsk People's Republic and Lugansk People's Republic. Video grab. Best quality available. Russian Defence Ministry/TASS]
